dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, uh, big news. You have to get, like, a whole new driving license just to ride a moped now. It's a disaster.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, uh, big news. You have to get, like, a whole new driving license just to ride a moped now. It's a disaster.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: holders of category A, B, or C licenses will not need to obtain the A1 category.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Whoa, no, wait, hold on. That's actually, um, totally wrong. It's the opposite, mostly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Whoa, no, wait, hold on. That's actually, um, totally wrong. It's the opposite, mostly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: holders of category A, B, or C licenses will not need to obtain the A1 category.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, great. More obscure regulations that affect nobody.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, great. More obscure regulations that affect nobody.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, listen! Okay, yes, mopeds are now officially motor vehicles as of April 5th, 2025. So, technically, an A1 license for them.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, listen! Okay, yes, mopeds are now officially motor vehicles as of April fifth, twenty twenty five. So, technically, an A1 license for them.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Recall that starting April 5, 2025, mopeds in Kazakhstan will officially be classified as motor vehicles.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: An A1. For a little scooter. Seriously? What's next, a commercial pilot's license for roller skates?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: An A1. For a little scooter. Seriously? What's next, a commercial pilot's license for roller skates?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But the key takeaway, the thing that actually matters, is that if you already have, like, an A, B, or C license... you don't need the A1.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But the key takeaway, the thing that actually matters, is that if you already have, like, an A, B, or C license... you don't need the A1.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: holders of category A, B, or C licenses will not need to obtain the A1 category.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, what? So I don't need to do anything?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, what? So I don't need to do anything?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! That's the whole point. You don't have to go through extra steps, you know, for a new category.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! That's the whole point. You don't have to go through extra steps, you know, for a new category.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: holders of category A, B, or C driver's licenses will be able to drive mopeds without additional permits or endorsements on their licenses.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, what's the big fuss about then? Why even bother announcing it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, what's the big fuss about then? Why even bother announcing it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Because it's a legal reclassification! It just means that for new moped riders who don't have other licenses, they'll need that A1.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Because it's a legal reclassification! It just means that for new moped riders who don't have other licenses, they'll need that A1.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Starting from April 5, driving mopeds will only be possible with a category A1 driver's license, as mopeds are now classified as motor vehicles. However, as Deputy Ekaterina Smyshlyaeva explained, holders of category A, B, or C licenses will not need to obtain the A1 category.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right. So, basically, for most people, it's just, uh, a whole lot of nothing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right. So, basically, for most people, it's just, uh, a whole lot of nothing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No! It simplifies things! It means less bureaucracy for existing drivers. No trips to the public service centers, no Ministry of Internal Affairs visits needed. That's, like, a win!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No! It simplifies things! It means less bureaucracy for existing drivers. No trips to the public service centers, no Ministry of Internal Affairs visits needed. That's, like, a win!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This new rule eliminates the need to visit the public service centers (PSC) or the Ministry of Internal Affairs to obtain special permits.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, yeah. Less paperwork. I guess that's... fine. If you say so.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, yeah. Less paperwork. I guess that's... fine. If you say so.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It is fine! Itâ€™s, um, important because it clarifies things without adding hassle for the majority.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It is fine! It's, um, important because it clarifies things without adding hassle for the majority.
